org.dejave.attica.engine.optimiser
Class PlanBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.dejave.attica.engine.optimiser.PlanBuilder

public class PlanBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

PlanBuilder: Given a collection of algebraic operators, constructs an evaluation plan to be used by the engine.

Author:
sviglas

buildInitialProjections

protected java.util.List<InitialProjection> buildInitialProjections(java.util.List<Projection> projections,
                                                                    java.util.List<Selection> selections,
                                                                    java.util.List<Join> joins,
                                                                    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> tables)
Given a list of projections, a list of selections and a list of joins, return a vector of initial projections, i.e., the projections that should be pushed down right above the scans.

Parameters:
projections - a list of algebraic projections.
selections - a list of algebraic selections.
joins - a list of algebraic joins.
tables - the set of tables names.
Returns:
a list of new projection operators.

                                                            java.util.List<RelationScan> scans)
                                                     throws PlanBuilderException
Imposes the initial projections over the scan operations.

Parameters:
iProjections - the vector of initial projections.
scans - the vector of scan operators.
Returns:

Throws:
PlanBuilderException - thrown whenever the projections cannot be imposed.

protected java.util.List<Operator> enumerateJoins(java.util.List<Join> joins,
                                                  java.util.List<Operator> branches)
                                           throws PlanBuilderException
Enumerates the joins between a collection of sub-plans.

Parameters:
joins - the logical joins to be enumerated.
branches - the incoming sub-plans (branches).
Returns:
a new vector of branches.
Throws:
PlanBuilderException - thrown whenever join enumeration or physical join construction is not possible.

pickPair

protected Triplet<Operator,Operator,java.util.List<Join>> pickPair(java.util.List<Join> joins,
                                                                   java.util.List<Operator> sources)
                                                            throws PlanBuilderException
Given a collection of algebraic joins and a collection of sub-plans, it picks a pair of branches to join.

Parameters:
joins - a list of logical joins.
sources - the incoming sub-plans.
Returns:
a triplet consisting of the left and the right input operators to the join, along with the algebraic join. The last one is set to null if there are no more joins, signifying that a Cartesian product should be built.
Throws:
PlanBuilderException - thrown whenever a pair cannot be picked.

joined

protected boolean joined(Operator left,
                         Operator right,
                         java.util.List<Join> joins)
                  throws PlanBuilderException
Given two operators (sub-plans) and a list of joins, it checks if the two operators are joined.

Parameters:
left - the left input.
right - the right input.
joins - a list of algebraic joins.
Returns:
true if the sources are joined, false otherwise.
Throws:
PlanBuilderException

Parameters:

PlanBuilderException - thrown whenever joins cannot be identified.
